item.title: Philippines ex-leader Duterte arrested on ICC warrant over drug killings
item.description: Rodrigo Duterte is accused of 'crimes against humanity' in a crackdown that left thousands dead.

item.title: Pakistan militants attack train and take passengers hostage
item.description: Police say at least three people were injured in the attack and it is unclear how many people are being held hostage.

item.title: Largest drone attack of war hits Moscow region
item.description: Three people were killed and another 18 were hurt in the strikes, including three children.

item.title: Kurdish-led SDF agrees to integrate with Syrian government forces
item.description: The militia alliance that controls much of north-eastern Syria will merge with new state institutions, the presidency says.

item.title: Sweden says Russia is greatest threat to its security
item.description: The nation's security service says there is a "tangible risk" of the security situation deteriorating further.
